page.title: 20Chatteris - Carnival Day
page.content:
On June 29th, 1985 Chatteris had a parade. The parade had ten floats and prizes were given for the best float decoration. The swimming club, The Kingfishers had the members on their float in T-shirts and track suits. The children of the Peter Pan Playgroup were all dressed up as Mr Men at a tea party.
The Army Cadets, who were celebrating their 75th Anniversary, had a green scamble net hanging over the side of their float and they gave a display of skills.
The Gala Queen had a float. One of the winning floats was dressed up as Fairyland with children in the costumes of fairies and elves playing in silver grass. The day was full of colour and fun.
